payload.name: update_plan
payload.arguments: {"plan":[{"step":"Add backend support for fetching a single team with stats to avoid loading all teams during edits.","status":"pending"},{"step":"Refactor front-end TeamSheet to use the targeted team fetch and simplify state management.","status":"pending"},{"step":"Improve team update mutations for optimistic updates without mass refetching, then validate.","status":"pending"}]}
